doc.title: A Date with Deception
doc.plot: Dorian and Virginia are having a bit of consensual bondage play. Virginia convinces it would be fun to have Dorian's date tied up in fetish clothes. Dorian readily agrees, but when the buxom brunette is securely roped and muzzled, Virginia leaves her roommate mute and struggling while she convinces Dorian's beau that he's been stood up, then takes her place as his date. Dorian struggles furiously against her bonds in the hope of teaching her troublesome roommate a well-deserved lesson in manners.
